Kanto Legendary Baby Birds JOEtheDM.

name: Red federation
author: Junkman
description: Aura abilitlies are gifts from Ho-oh. Actual fakemon art by ShinArt on Youtube. Mainly Gen VII.

name: Poke by Adod
author: JuanTipo
description: Variant types created by our DM, images to come.

name: Mystifying Marvels
author: Jerakin
description: Pokémon from future generations that are needed for my campaign. Only Alolan Diglett and Dugtrio.

name: Strict Genders
author: Jerakin
description: Enforces strict genders on Pokémon that have it in the game. Not all Pokémon can be any gender.

name: Alolan Variations
author: Professor OniLink
description:
This contains the Alolan Forms.
Use 'Johto Server' for up to date Pokemon.

name: Alolan and Baby Birds
author: Professor OniLink
description:
This contains the legendary birds and Alolan Forms.
Use 'Johto Server' for up to date Pokemon.

name: Johto Server
author: Professor OniLink
description: This contains the legendary birds, Galarian Forms, and Alolan Forms.

name: Ptole Region
author: Victini1412
description: The Ptole Regional regional varients and other fakemon.

name: The Sloth N Friends δ Special
author: Sloth The DM
description: This is a package consisting of many different pokemon we know and love, but with a catch they are Delta δ Species, this means similar to regional variants they vary in type from their counterparts. The inspiration for this was a fan game called Insurgence. This is the package my group will us on ouw pokemon adventure that you can join us on by looking for Sloth N Friends on Youtube.
